Name: hin-suhelfarooqkhan-la
Author: Suhel Farooq Khan And Saifur Rahman Nadwi

Translations.Text: jab aasamaan tarkh jaega
aur jab taare jhad padenge
aur jab dariya bah (kar ek doosare se mil) jaenge
aur jab kabren ukhaad dee jaengee
tab har shakhsh ko maaloom ho jaega ki usane aage kya bheja tha aur peechhe kya chhoda tha
ai insaan tumhen apane paravaradigaar ke baare mein kis cheez ne dhoka diya
jisane tujhe paida kiya to tujhe duroost banaaya aur munaasib aaza die
aur jis soorat mein usane chaaha tere jod band milae
haan baat ye hai ki tum log jaza (ke din) ko jhuthalaate ho
haaloki tum par nigehabaan muqarrar hain
burzug log (pharishte sab baaton ko) likhane vaale (keraaman qaatebeen)
jo kuchh tum karate ho vah sab jaanate hain
beshak neko kaar (behisht kee) neamaton mein honge
aur badakaar log yaqeenan jahannum mein jaza ke din
usee mein jhonke jaenge
aur vah log usase chhup na sakenge
aur tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya hai
phir tumhen kya maaloom ki jaza ka din kya cheez hai
us din koee shakhsh kisee shakhsh kee bhalaee na kar sakega aur us din hukm sirph khuda hee ka hoga
naap taul mein kamee karane vaalon kee kharaabee hai
jo auren se naap kar len to poora poora len
aur jab unakee naap ya taul kar den to kam kar den
kya ye log itana bhee khyaal nahin karate
ki ek bade (sakht) din (qayaamat) mein uthae jaenge
jis din tamaam log saare jahaann ke paravaradigaar ke saamane khade honge
